edu.umd.cs.psl.reasoner

Interface Reasoner

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GroundKernelStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AD3Reasoner, ADMMReasoner, BooleanMaxWalkSat, BooleanMCSat, ConicReasoner, ExecutableReasoner, LatentTopicNetworkADMMReasoner, UAIFormatReasoner

    public interface Reasoner
extends GroundKernelStore
    A GroundKernelStore that can minimize the total weighted incompatibility of its GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Releases all resources acquired by this Reasoner.
      void optimize()
      Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the this Reasoner's GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.umd.cs.psl.application.groundkernelstore.GroundKernelStore

        addGroundKernel, changedGroundKernel, changedGroundKernelWeight, changedGroundKernelWeights, containsGroundKernel, getCompatibilityKernels, getConstraintKernels, getGroundKernel, getGroundKernels, getGroundKernels, removeGroundKernel, size

    • Method Detail

        Minimizes the total weighted incompatibility of the this Reasoner's GroundCompatibilityKernels such that the infeasibility of its GroundConstraintKernels is (close to) zero by optimizing the RandomVariableAtoms.
